name: Mop
tagline: The Moving Object Pipeline: discovery & tracking of trans-Neptunian objects
body: MOP is a software pipeline designed to detect trans-Neptunian objects in CFHT MEGAPRIME data. The driver programs are mostly in Python 2.7 with the analysis components in Fortran and IRAF.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
